name: Witchcrafter Scroll
desc: Once per turn, if a Spellcaster monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can draw 1 card. If you would discard a card(s) to activate the effect of a “Witchcrafter” monster, you can send this card to the GY instead. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card is in your GY while you control a "Witchcrafter" monster: Place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only each effect of "Witchcrafter Scroll" once per turn.
str1: Send "Witchcrafter Scroll" to the GY instead
str2: Place this card face-up in your Spell/Trap Zone
